articles.author: Adrian Padeanu
articles.title: 2022 Ford Maverick Compact Truck Livestream Debut: Watch It Here - Motor1
articles.description: Ford is introducing a new entry-level pickup in North America where it's dusting off the Maverick name for a Hyundai Santa Cruz competitor.
articles.content: Trucks are big in the United States, both literally and figuratively. Ford is looking to take advantage of the segment's immense potential furthermore by downsizing the recipe for a sub-Ranger model.… [+1860 chars]

articles.title: Beijing Winter Olympics ‘diplomatic boycott’ pushed across West - South China Morning Post
articles.description: China hawks across Europe and North America lend their voices to the clamour for a boycott of the Winter Olympics, to be held in Beijing next February.
